question: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojna aims at:
option1: setting up of 15,000 MW of Grid-Connected Solar PV Power Project
option2: efficient lighting programme by distributing LED to households
option3: providing free LPG connections to Women from BPL Households
option4: skill development of individuals to ramp up productivity and economic growth
answer: providing free LPG connections to Women from BPL Households
explanation: Pradhan Mantri Ujjawala Yojna aims at providing free LPG connections to Women from BPL Households.
